definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) A ball game where two teams of players on horseback use long-handled mallets to propel the ball along the ground and into their opponent's goal.
The game of ice polo , one of the ancestors of ice hockey ; a similar game played on the ice , or on a prepared floor, by players wearing skates .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A ball game where two teams of players on horseback use long-handled mallets to propel the ball along the ground and into their opponent's goal.
secondary_definitions: The game of ice polo , one of the ancestors of ice hockey ; a similar game played on the ice , or on a prepared floor, by players wearing skates .

definitions.definition: A Spanish gypsy dance characterized by energetic movements of the body while the feet merely shuffle or glide , with unison singing and rhythmic clapping of hands .

main_definition: A Spanish gypsy dance characterized by energetic movements of the body while the feet merely shuffle or glide , with unison singing and rhythmic clapping of hands .
